com.cleo.lexicom.external

Interface ISyncer


  • public interface ISyncer
    Establishes an interface to VersaLex's Synchronizer. Refer to ILexiCom.getSyncer().

    Methods provided allow for querying of synchronization status

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getMasterActiveVersalex(java.lang.String item)
      Returns the serial number of the active master VersaLex for the item
      java.lang.String getVersalexAlias(java.lang.String serialNumber)
      Returns the alias for the VersaLex serial number
      boolean isActiveVersalex(java.lang.String item, boolean master)
      Indicates whether VersaLex is active overall (Sync.HOSTS) or specifically active in processing the schedule (Sync.SCHEDULE) or routes (Sync.ROUTE)
      boolean isSynced(java.lang.String item)
      Indicates whether VersaLex is synced overall (Sync.HOSTS) or specifically in processing the schedule (Sync.SCHEDULE) or routes (Sync.ROUTE)

    • Method Detail

      • isSynced

        boolean isSynced(java.lang.String item)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Indicates whether VersaLex is synced overall (Sync.HOSTS) or specifically in processing the schedule (Sync.SCHEDULE) or routes (Sync.ROUTE)
        Parameters:
        item - either Sync.HOSTS, Sync.SCHEDULE, or Sync.ROUTE
        Returns:
        whether synced VersaLex
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • isActiveVersalex

        boolean isActiveVersalex(java.lang.String item,
                         boolean master)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Indicates whether VersaLex is active overall (Sync.HOSTS) or specifically active in processing the schedule (Sync.SCHEDULE) or routes (Sync.ROUTE)
        Parameters:
        item - either Sync.HOSTS, Sync.SCHEDULE, or Sync.ROUTE
        master - if true, checks if VersaLex is the master active VersaLex
        Returns:
        whether active (master) VersaLex
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getMasterActiveVersalex

        java.lang.String getMasterActiveVersalex(java.lang.String item)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the serial number of the active master VersaLex for the item
        Parameters:
        item - either Sync.HOSTS, Sync.SCHEDULE, or Sync.ROUTE
        Returns:
        serial number of the active master VersaLex or null if not synced
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getVersalexAlias

        java.lang.String getVersalexAlias(java.lang.String serialNumber)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the alias for the VersaLex serial number
        Parameters:
        serialNumber - VersaLex serial number
        Returns:
        alias of the serial number or null if alias not assigned
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
